title: Minister visits PIMS hospital to inquire health of JUI-F leader
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 03 (APP): Minister of Housing and Works Maulana Abdul Wasay on Wednesday visited the Pakistan Institute of Medical Sciences (PIMS) Hospital and inquired Maulvi Obaidullahâ€™s health.
Maulvi Obaidullah is a leader of Jamiat Ulema Islam-Fazl of Balochistan chapter, said a press release issued here by the Ministry of Housing and Works.
The minister expressed good wishes for the speedy recovery of Maulvi Obaidullah.
